title: Virtual Environment-Based Pre-Service Teacher Education Design for Transformative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational theory knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Environments requiring project-based collaborative learning using MUVE (Multi-User Virtual Environment) platforms

learning_goals: Learners can perform creative lesson design integrating diverse educational perspectives using virtual environments (MUVE)
Learners can establish learner-centered transformative educational strategies through interaction analysis in digital spaces
Learners can propose methods to apply educational scenarios developed in virtual environments to real classroom settings based on peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
